interaction.title: Compose maps
interaction.content: Set basemaps to lay behind another layers to improve pointing the main aspects.

interaction.title: Inspect values in realtime

interaction.title: Simulate sceneries
interaction.content: Apply simulations with maps values together with user input values.

interaction.title: Filter map to interest ranges
interaction.content: Allows to dinamically limit range of values in each situation.

interaction.title: Show transitions
interaction.content: Select a value or a transition and only show the changed regions between them.

database.title: CSR DATABASE
database.content: Updated categorized and with metadata all CSR Maps are available to your project.

database.title: DISPLAY YOUR MAPS
database.content: Easily configure a server to display your maps in CSRMaps or even in GIS software.

database.title: OTHERS SOURCES
database.content: Use others services in your project: CSV, JSON or cloud storage services.
